steps.1: Create a document from your dashboard.
steps.2: Write or paste content, and save versions.

steps.5: Manage your items with sorting, filters and recent activities.

q1.question: Can I export to PDF and Word?
q1.answer: Yes. In the document page, use the "Download PDF" and "Download Word" actions.

q2.question: How do signature and timestamping work?
q2.answer: Signature changes status to "signed". Timestamping calculates a SHA-256 hash, kept to attest integrity.

q3.question: Is translation included?
q3.answer: Yes, via a dedicated service. Choose the language (fr, en, de) and launch a contextualized translation.

q4.question: Can I share my documents?
q4.answer: Yes. Native browser sharing when available, otherwise link copied to clipboard.
